entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
